Removed Task tool delegation pattern - skills now provide instructions for direct tool invocation

Preserved all 91+ macros and comprehensive documentation

All workflows converted from JavaScript pseudocode to instructional format
Maintained tab context preservation and multi-turn workflow patterns
Kept token conservation rules and macro-first execution pattern
Removed agents directory - all functionality now in skill modules
Initial plugin release
Refactored from slash commands to sub-agent architecture
Added 5 specialized sub-agents (browser, ecommerce, forms, scraper, qa)
Enhanced browser skill with delegation patterns
Created plugin manifest for community distribution
Added comprehensive documentation (4 plugin docs, 11 skill docs)
91+ macros across 7 websites (40+ universal + 51 site-specific)

Enhanced browser-ecommerce agent with 34 e-commerce macros (Amazon, Google Shopping, Walmart)
